comments:
Description:
Pop up the org.eclipse.jface error when switch to library data cube - link groups[1101]

Step:
1.New a library, datasource, dataset, data cube
2.New a report and drop the data cube into report data cube group
3.Double click the data cube and selection - Link groups

Actual result:
Error pop up.

Cube is a complex case, a normal report item from library should not be setted property on it, but cube is different. Model should solve it.
UI should not add user property definition on library report items. Reassign.
This is a ubiquity problem in the report item from library. The cube need a lot of informations(dataset, for example) in the library, but we couldn't deal with it.

traces.message: The module is read-only and operation is forbidden.
